title: Sage North America Headquarters Opens in Midtown Atlanta
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 10:30 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Sage 
ATLANTA, GA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/21/15 -- Sage North America , a leading provider of business management software and services to small and medium businesses, today announced that the company's North America headquarters is officially open. Located in the heart of Midtown Atlanta at Atlantic Station, Sage will be well positioned to better serve its customers and attract the right talent to deliver exciting technology to small and medium businesses. 
Tweet This : .@SageNAmerica opens new Atlanta HQ with ribbon cutting ceremony with Georgia's @GovernorDeal & @KasimReed: http://bit.ly/1Owrd8v 
"I am proud to celebrate the opening of the new Sage North America headquarters and innovation hub in Midtown Atlanta," said Mayor Kasim Reed. "Sage chose Atlanta because of our talented pool of technology workers, coming from our best-in-class colleges and universities. A global company needs global connectivity, and the world's busiest and most efficient passenger airport offers unparalleled access to international markets. Sage North America has found an excellent home here in Atlanta." 
The headquarters also serves as a Customer Business Center (CBC), which is designed to revolutionize the way Sage supports customers, focusing on customers of Sage Live . Other Sage business areas have a presence in the Midtown Atlanta office, including: Sage Payment Solutions , Sage One , Sage Accountant Solutions , and digital marketing. Over time, Sage will add new areas of the business to the Midtown Atlanta office. 
The opening of the headquarters is not only a significant milestone for Sage in building deep, life-long relationships with customers, but also for the future of the company's talent and offerings. 
"What an exciting time for Sage as we open our new North America headquarters in the heart of Midtown Atlanta," said Marc Scheipe, interim president of Sage North America. "As we bring new jobs to the area, we look forward to reinventing the way we work for the better of small and medium businesses." 
"Georgia is home to one of the fastest growing innovation hubs in the world," said Governor Deal. "The Sage North America headquarters is a great addition to our state and is one of the many reasons Georgia continues to be a top-ranked place in the nation in which to do business. This grand opening speaks to our pro-business climate, qualified workforce and the growing worldwide recognition of our state's technology industry." 
The Sage Midtown Atlanta office is expected to bring 450 jobs to the city over the next few years.
